values.description: The algorithm control features let you adjust your algorithm while it executes live so that you can perform actions that are not written in the project files.
values.keywords: live trading, manual orders, liquidate positions, stop execution, update algorithm code
values.og:description: The algorithm control features let you adjust your algorithm while it executes live so that you can perform actions that are not written in the project files.
